sentences.sContent: I could see the fishing boat to starboard.
sentences.sCn: 我能看见右侧的那艘渔船。

sentences.sContent: He detected a ship moving down the starboard side of the submarine.
sentences.sCn: 他发现了一艘正沿潜水艇右侧航行的船。

trans.tranOther: the side of a ship or aircraft that is on your right when you are facing forwards
The starboard side of a ship or an aircraft is the right side when you are on it and facing toward the front
